resources.string: My love for you and your mother and brother are as massive as the oceans
No sea is massive enough to bath away the blessing that being your brother is
I can see from the relationship and love between mom\'s daughter and sons \nthat mom\'s love is more pure than the most pure of waters.
The Bahamas should be considered a shitty place compared to the beauty of yours.
Am I grateful to be your brother? .
If today is your birthday, be happy, if today\'s not your birthday, be happier\nhave an amazing life
Are you sure you want to do this?

One day we'll be riding to the edges
living free of worries
with the happiest of mom's on the seat
 with the luckiest of son's by her side
Aim higher girl, everything is possible
